Numerical pain rating scale scores of 6 to 10 during the Copenhagen 5-second squeeze test were related to substantially impaired sports-related hip and groin function.55 @aptaCurrentConceptsOrthopaedic2024 -->


Developed for assessing hip and groin disability in a young and active population @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020.

- 37 items
- 6 subscales
    - Symptoms: 7 Items
    - Pain: 10 Items
    - ADLs: 5 Items
    - Sports/recreation: 8 Items
    - Physical Activity: 2 Items
    - Quality of Life (QOL): 5 Items
- 5-point Likert Scale (0-4pts)
- Final score is normalized to 100
- 100 is defined as "no problem" and 0 is maximal problems @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
